subject: Re: [junit] Best practices [Topic]
msgSnippet: Is it possible for people to just submit request, so that we won t overwrite each other s change?  I can see that this will become a hot topic and there will
messageBody:
Is it possible for people to just submit request, so that we won't overwrite
each other's change? I can see that this will become a hot topic and there
will be cases that several people changing it at the same time.



"J. B. Rainsberger" wrote:

> >I have only been using JUnit for a few months and I am focusing on
> >creating "best practices" templates for our development team.
> >
> >I would greatly appreciate the insight of more experienced users.
> >
> >If you have ideas for "Best Practices" that you think would be
> >beneficial to the users of JUnit, please reply to this email with the
> >topic.
>
> Let me know if this works for you...
>
> http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?JavaUnitBestPractices
>
> JBR.
>
